headline: Citi Pivots to Household Care for 2026 Favoring Newell Brands (NWL) as Inventory Destocking and Negative Comparisons End
summary: Newell Brands Inc. (NASDAQ:NWL) is one of the cheap penny stocks to invest in. On December 17, Citi raised the firm’s price target on Newell Brands to $3.75 from $3.50 while keeping a Neutral rating on the shares. Citi is recalibrating its focus for 2026, moving away from the bullish stance it held on non-alcoholic […]
